Package org.cid15.aem.veneer.api

Interface Inheritable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    VeneeredPage, VeneeredResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent
    public interface Inheritable
    An accessible instance (such as a Resource or Page) that supports hierarchy-based content inheritance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Optional<String> getAsHrefInherited​(String propertyName)
      Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get the href to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      Optional<LinkBuilder> getAsLinkBuilderInherited​(String propertyName)
      Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get a link builder for the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      Optional<Link> getAsLinkInherited​(String propertyName)
      Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get a link to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      <T> List<T> getAsListInherited​(String propertyName, Class<T> type)
      Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of the given type, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      Optional<VeneeredPage> getAsPageInherited​(String propertyName)
      Get a page from the value of the given property, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      List<VeneeredPage> getAsPageListInherited​(String propertyName)
      Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of pages, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      Optional<VeneeredResource> getAsResourceInherited​(String propertyName)
      Get an Optional resource instance for a property on this resource containing the path of another Resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      List<VeneeredResource> getAsResourceListInherited​(String propertyName)
      Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of resources, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      <AdapterType>
      Optional<AdapterType>      		 getAsTypeInherited​(String propertyName, Class<AdapterType> type)
      Get an Optional type instance for a property on this resource containing the path of another Resource in the repository, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
      <AdapterType>
      List<AdapterType>      		 getAsTypeListInherited​(String propertyName, Class<AdapterType> type)
      Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of the given type, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.

      Optional<String> getImageReferenceInherited​(boolean isSelf)

      <T> Optional<T> getInherited​(String propertyName, Class<T> type)
      Get a property value from the current resource.

      Get a property value from the current resource.

      Get the children of a resource relative to the current resource.

      Get the children of a resource relative to the current resource meeting the predicate condition.

      Get the children of the current resource meeting the predicate condition.

      Get a list of tags for the default property name (cq:tags).
      List<com.day.cq.tagging.Tag> getTagsInherited​(String propertyName)
      Get a list of tags for the given property name.

    • Method Detail

      • getAsHrefInherited

        Optional<String> getAsHrefInherited​(String propertyName)
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get the href to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        Returns:
        Optional href

      • getAsLinkInherited

        Optional<Link> getAsLinkInherited​(String propertyName)
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get a link to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        Returns:
        Optional link

      • getAsLinkBuilderInherited

        Optional<LinkBuilder> getAsLinkBuilderInherited​(String propertyName)
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get a link builder for the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        Returns:
        Optional link builder

      • getAsListInherited

        <T> List<T> getAsListInherited​(String propertyName,
                               Class<T> type)
        Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of the given type, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Type Parameters:
        T - property type
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of multi-valued property
        type - property type
        Returns:
        list of property values or an empty list if the property does not exist

      • getAsPageInherited

        Optional<VeneeredPage> getAsPageInherited​(String propertyName)
        Get a page from the value of the given property, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource. The property value will be localized to the current page context before getting the page.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - property name
        Returns:
        Optional page for property value

      • getAsPageListInherited

        List<VeneeredPage> getAsPageListInherited​(String propertyName)
        Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of pages, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a list of page paths
        Returns:
        list of pages, or empty list if either the property does not exist or pages do not exist for the property values

      • getAsResourceInherited

        Optional<VeneeredResource> getAsResourceInherited​(String propertyName)
        Get an Optional resource instance for a property on this resource containing the path of another Resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a resource path
        Returns:
        Optional instance of the resource, or absent if either the property does not exist or does not resolve to a resource

      • getAsResourceListInherited

        List<VeneeredResource> getAsResourceListInherited​(String propertyName)
        Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of resources, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a list of resource paths
        Returns:
        list of resources, or empty list if either the property does not exist or does resolve to a list of resources

      • getAsTypeInherited

        <AdapterType> Optional<AdapterType> getAsTypeInherited​(String propertyName,
                                                       Class<AdapterType> type)
        Get an Optional type instance for a property on this resource containing the path of another Resource in the repository, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Type Parameters:
        AdapterType - adapter class that is adaptable from Resource
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a resource path
        type - type to adapt from resource
        Returns:
        Optional instance of the specified type, or absent if either the property does not exist or the resource does not adapt to the provided type

      • getAsTypeListInherited

        <AdapterType> List<AdapterType> getAsTypeListInherited​(String propertyName,
                                                       Class<AdapterType> type)
        Get a multi-valued property from the current resource as a list of the given type, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this resource.
        Type Parameters:
        AdapterType - adapter class that is adaptable from Resource
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a list of resource paths
        type - type to adapt from resource corresponding to each path value
        Returns:
        list of the specified type, or empty list if either the property does not exist or the resource does not adapt to the provided type

      • getImageReferenceInherited

        Optional<String> getImageReferenceInherited​(boolean isSelf)
        Parameters:
        isSelf - if true, resource will attempt to find the image reference property on the current resource
        Returns:
        Optional inherited image reference

      • getImageReferenceInherited

        Optional<String> getImageReferenceInherited()
        Returns:
        Optional inherited image reference

      • getImageReferenceInherited

        Optional<String> getImageReferenceInherited​(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - image name
        Returns:
        Optional inherited image reference

      • getInherited

        <T> T getInherited​(String propertyName,
                   T defaultValue)
        Get a property value from the current resource. If no value is found, traverse up the content tree respective to the page and relative resource path until a value is found.
        Type Parameters:
        T - result type
        Parameters:
        propertyName - property to get
        defaultValue - value if no result is found
        Returns:
        inherited value

      • getInherited

        <T> Optional<T> getInherited​(String propertyName,
                             Class<T> type)
        Get a property value from the current resource. If no value is found, traverse up the content tree respective to the page and relative resource path until a value is found, returning an absent Optional if not. This returns the same value as the underlying ValueMap wrapped in an Optional instance instead of returning null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        Parameters:
        propertyName - property name
        type - property type
        Returns:
        Optional of the given type containing the property value or absent if no value is found

      • getTagsInherited

        List<com.day.cq.tagging.Tag> getTagsInherited()
        Get a list of tags for the default property name (cq:tags). If no tags are found, traverse up the content tree respective to the page and relative path until a value is found, returning an empty list if not.
        Returns:
        list of tags or empty list if not found

      • getTagsInherited

        List<com.day.cq.tagging.Tag> getTagsInherited​(String propertyName)
        Get a list of tags for the given property name. If no tags are found, traverse up the content tree respective to the page and relative path until a value is found, returning an empty list if not.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing an array of tag IDs
        Returns:
        list of tags or empty list if not found

      • getResourceInherited

        Optional<VeneeredResource> getResourceInherited​(String relativePath)
        Get a child resource relative to the current resource, inheriting from a parent page if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - path relative to current resource
        Returns:
        direct child resource if it exists, otherwise the child resource at this relative path for an ancestor page

      • getResourcesInherited

        List<VeneeredResource> getResourcesInherited()
        Get the children of the current resource. If the current resource has no children, inherit from an ancestor page.
        Returns:
        list of resources representing children of the current resource or inherited from an ancestor page (or empty list if none exist)

      • getResourcesInherited

        List<VeneeredResource> getResourcesInherited​(Predicate<VeneeredResource> predicate)
        Get the children of the current resource meeting the predicate condition. If the current resource has no children, inherit from an ancestor page.
        Parameters:
        predicate - predicate used to filter resources
        Returns:
        list of resources representing children of the current resource or inherited from an ancestor page (or empty list if none exist)

      • getResourcesInherited

        List<VeneeredResource> getResourcesInherited​(String relativePath)
        Get the children of a resource relative to the current resource. If resource does not exist relative to current page, inherit from a parent page.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - path relative to current resource
        Returns:
        list of resources representing children of the addressed resource or inherited from a parent page (or empty list if none exist)

      • getResourcesInherited

        List<VeneeredResource> getResourcesInherited​(String relativePath,
                                             Predicate<VeneeredResource> predicate)
        Get the children of a resource relative to the current resource meeting the predicate condition. If resource does not exist relative to current page, inherit from a parent page.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - path relative to current resource
        predicate - predicate used to filter resources
        Returns:
        list of resources representing children of the addressed resource or inherited from a parent page (or empty list if none exist)
